function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of affordable provision of water and safe sanitation in settlements","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to poor sanitation and hygiene","Mitigation":"Rapid scaling up of affordable provision of water and safe sanitation","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, water purification systems","People":"Residents of settlements, marginalized groups","Owner":"Local governments, utilities, private companies"},{"Description":"Breakdown of support structures for vulnerable groups","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of marginalized groups and households","Mitigation":"Involvement of community groups in distributing services and resources, identifying and strengthening supportive social networks and institutions","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, social network analysis tools","People":"Marginalized groups, households outside local support structures","Owner":"Community groups, local governments"},{"Description":"Lack of predefined protocols for vulnerability in epidemic response","Impact":"Ineffective allocation of resources during a crisis","Mitigation":"Flexible planning and resource allocation strategies, dynamic assessment of vulnerabilities","Technologies":"Data analytics for real-time vulnerability assessment, crisis management systems","People":"Response and planning authorities, crisis management teams","Owner":"Health agencies, disaster management agencies"}]}
